tool_description: API that is dedicated to various machine readable data about Pokemon Go.

api_list.name: Type Effectiveness
api_list.description: This API provides information on how type multipliers are applied when a Pokemon attacks, which is crucial for maximizing damage in raids and PvP.

api_list.name: Pokemon Rarity
api_list.description: This API categorizes Pokemon into three rarity types: Standard, Legendary, and Mythic, detailing their trading rules and buddy walking distances.

api_list.name: Pokemon Power Up Requirements
api_list.description: This API outlines the stardust and candy costs required to power up a Pokemon at each level, up to a maximum level of 40.

api_list.name: Pokemon Genders
api_list.description: This API provides the gender distribution for each Pokemon, including the percentage chance of being male, female, or genderless.

api_list.name: Current Pokemon Moves
api_list.description: This API returns the current moves that Pokemon can learn through catching, evolving, or using TMs, including special moves available during events.

api_list.name: Pokemon Evolutions
api_list.description: This API lists all Pokemon that can evolve, detailing their evolution requirements and potential evolution forms.

api_list.name: Raid Exclusive Pokemon
api_list.description: This API provides a list of Pokemon that can only be found in specific raid levels.

api_list.name: Pokemon Buddy Distances
api_list.description: This API details the distances required to earn candy from Pokemon when they are set as your buddy.

api_list.name: Pokemon Candy to Evolve
api_list.description: This API groups Pokemon by their candy requirements for evolution, providing a list of Pokemon and their respective candy needs.

api_list.name: Pokemon Stats
api_list.description: This API returns the base stats (attack, defense, stamina) for each Pokemon, which determine their strength in battles.

api_list.name: Nesting Pokemon
api_list.description: This API provides a list of Pokemon that are known to nest in specific locations.

api_list.name: Pokemon Maximum CP
api_list.description: This API returns the maximum CP that each Pokemon can achieve at level 40 with perfect stats.

api_list.name: Shiny Pokemon
api_list.description: This API provides information on which Pokemon can be found as shiny variants and the methods to obtain them.

api_list.name: Alolan Pokemon
api_list.description: This API lists the Alolan variants of Pokemon, which have different appearances and typings compared to their standard forms.

api_list.name: Fast Moves
api_list.description: This API provides a complete list of fast moves available in the current Pokemon Go game.

api_list.name: Pokemon Names
api_list.description: This API returns a list of Pokemon names and their corresponding IDs.

api_list.name: Charged Moves
api_list.description: This API provides a complete list of charged moves available in the current Pokemon Go game.

api_list.name: Released Pokemon
api_list.description: This API provides a list of all Pokemon that have been released in Pokemon Go from the first three generations.

api_list.name: Weather Boosts
api_list.description: This API lists the types of Pokemon that receive boosts during specific weather conditions.

api_list.name: Possible Ditto Pokemon
api_list.description: This API provides a list of Pokemon that can potentially transform into Ditto when caught.

api_list.name: Pokemon Types
api_list.description: This API lists the types of each Pokemon, which affect their strengths and weaknesses in battles.

api_list.name: Pokemon Encounter Data
api_list.description: This API provides metrics that influence the catch rate and behavior of Pokemon during encounters.
